title: Mobile-Based Self-Directed Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Flexible learning design for in-service trainees, considering workplace applicability, with project-based assessments to validate practical implementation.

learning_goals: Learners will establish and execute a self-directed learning plan of at least five hours per week using mobile devices within four weeks
Learners will build a system for analyzing, organizing, and sharing learning materials in mobile environments by week 8, achieving at least 80% improvement in learning efficiency
Learners will complete a digital portfolio (including project deliverables) to solve real-world work problems using mobile learning tools by week 12
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
